Description: Temptation of St Anthony; the saint kneels with a woman at his side, a devil in the tree above and other demons or monsters, skeleton and a head Pen and brown ink and brown wash, heightened with white, on brown prepared paper
Producer name: Formerly attributed to: Pieter Bruegel the Elder
Bibliographic references: Popham (D & F) 1932 / Dutch and Flemish drawings of the XV and XVI centuries (27) (as Anonymous)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
